BBC Homepage

Top News Story

US demands well cap release plan

The US government orders BP to submit a plan for reopening its capped oil well in the Gulf of Mexico amid fears of a methane leak.

Top Story

Nick Swinmurn: 'Keep it scrappy'

Nick Swinmurn set up the online retailer Zappos in 1999. A chaotic approach can sometimes be the best way forward in a new business, he says.
